Header: Everyone invited to create a better future for next generations
Content: Speaker Karu Jayasuriya says that everyone should commit themselves to create a better future for next generations. The Speaker said this while attending the conclusion ceremony of State Languages Week. The ceremony has been organized by the Ministry of National Integration, Official Languages, Education and Training Institutes. The language channel was officially launched on the occasion. Minister Mano Ganeshan was present on the occasion. Speaker Karu Jayasuriya said that none of the religions has propagated racism. He said that it would be a major service for next generations if all leaders sit together and solve present problems. He said that there are wise politicians in the North and East. The Speaker requested them to join hands to solve the problems even after next election.
